name: Chris Brown | Teambreezy | Tumblr Dash Theme
description:
A Chris Brown dash theme for Tumblr. Team Breezy and fellow Chris Brown fans can enjoy.

If there is an error then don't hesitate to contact me. I have not personally used all the functions of this theme so I am not aware if there are minor issues with it.

user.name: DearKuchu
user.about:
Hello, I'm Kuchu. 

I am primarily a Tumblr user so I will be creating things such as Tumblr dash themes, icons, logos, and/or buttons. 

If there is an error and/or something needs to be updated, please inform me. I don't always check with the latest updates considering Tumblr has recently been making a lot of them.
